Steps.Message: Update at 13:45 - Our engineers are now digging down to the underground cables where we believe a fault has caused the power issues. This requires a lot of work but we are aiming to have the power back on in the Station Road North area between 14:30 and 15:30. We apologise for the disruption and inconvenience this has and is causing and will keep you informed with news from site.

We became aware of a power cut at 07:01. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 13:45 - Our engineers are now digging down to the underground cables where we believe a fault has caused the power issues. This requires a lot of work but we are aiming to have the power back on in the Station Road North area between 14:30 and 15:30. We apologise for the disruption and inconvenience this has and is causing and will keep you informed with news from site.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
